name: TOBEX_ACTIVE
description: tobEx adds a lot to scripts, it should be active to get better results ingame

name: TARGET_ALLEGIANCE
description: allegiance of the target, should always be GOODCUTOFF except for summons and party allies (both cases need a declaration in each script)

name: TARGET_TYPE_COUNT
description: number of target per type. For example, 3 will check the 3 nearest fighters, then the 3 nearest mages, then 3 nearest clerics.

name: TARGET_RANDOM
description: randomize target acquisition. If true, all valid targets get a chance to be selected. If false, first valid target is selected.

name: PROBABILITY_ACTION_SPELL
description: probability to do an action when all triggers are valid.

name: PROBABILITY_ACTION_ITEM
description: probability to do an action when all triggers are valid.

name: CHECK_SPELL_PROTECTION
description: check.spellProtection includes minor globe, spell immunity, spell turning...

name: CHECK_WEAPON_PROTECTION
description: check.weaponProtection includes stoneskin, protection from missile/normal/weapon/magic weapon, mantle...

name: CHECK_ELEMENTAL_RESISTANCE
description: elementalResistance includes fire, cold, electricity, and acid
